text: If you're smelling gas in the area of Shady Lane Cres in Markham, it's due to a cut gas line. Police and Fire on scene.
Waited in line for gas behind Riff Raff today pic.twitter.com/ThIi67BcRl
David Memorial/Tamina intersection is CLOSED due to a gas line break. Repairs are in progress. No evacuations are underway at this time.
